CategoryInflectionRule - Class in org.jvnet.inflector.rule

Rule - Interface in org.jvnet.inflector
A Rule represents how a word changes from one form to another.
RuleBasedPluralizer - Class in org.jvnet.inflector
An implementation of Pluralizer that is implemented using an ordered list of Rules.
RuleBasedPluralizer() - Constructor for class org.jvnet.inflector.RuleBasedPluralizer
Constructs a pluralizer with an empty list of rules.
RuleBasedPluralizer(List<Rule>, Locale) - Constructor for class org.jvnet.inflector.RuleBasedPluralizer
Constructs a pluralizer that uses a list of rules then an identity Pluralizer if none of the rules match.
